title: Numa Numa
content:

[url=http://www.albinoblacksheep.com/flash/numa.php]www.albinoblacksheep.com/flash/numa.php[/url]

title: Re: Numa Numa
content:
Mmmm, I like that song. I know what most of the words mean now - I've looked up the lyrics to it often enough.
The song's called Dragostea Din Tei, by the way, by O-Zone.gettin' siggy with it

title: Much class indeed.
content:
Aah. Dragostea Din Tei. I don't bother with all that Flash junk, but I know the song. O-Zone rule. Got their album (Disco-Zone) last year sometime after a friend discovered them on some MP3 site, and have listened to it constantly since.

I like several of other songs on the album better than this one, but it rocks nonetheless.

*votes Awesome*Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

title: Re: Numa Numa
content:
I fear you are the victim of someone looking through old threads, forgetting that they're not current and voting in them.

I think I may have been caught out on the very same thing before.

That or someone's tooling around voting in old things just because they can...

title: Re: Numa Numa
content:
No, he's right; someone came by and voted, so the topics move up and act as if new.
